name: Carbon Credit
description: Carbon Credit Token (CCT) is a cryptocurrency that is backed by regulated carbon credit. Each CCT represents 1 kilogram of European Union Allowance (EUA) â€“ the most traded carbon credits in the world. Through buying and holding CCTs you have an impact on how some of the world's largest polluters do business. Price appreciation in Carbon Allowances will help incentivise Carbon Emitting firms to acquire energy from more environmentally friendly sources. By revolutionizing how consumers can access carbon markets, CCT is making it easier than ever for everyone to participate in the fight against climate change.
